summary: This code defines the protocol ITryActionFoDelegate for a solution interface, used to attach R, P, HN, and GL tasks. It also provides a method actionFoModels that returns an array of fo models. This is part of the SMG_NothingIsAll project and was created by "air" on May 28th, 2020. The code has been updated on March 27th, 2021 to support reflection for sub-tasks when outFoModel implements this interface.
